verses.verse: And <WG1161> in<WG1722> those<WG5025> days,<WG2250> when the number of the<WG3588> disciples<WG3101> were multiplied,<WG4129> there arose<WG1096> a murmuring<WG1112> of the<WG3588> Grecians<WG1675> against<WG4314> the<WG3588> Hebrews,<WG1445> because<WG3754> their<WG846> widows<WG5503> were neglected<WG3865> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> daily<WG2522> ministration.<WG1248>

Then <WG1161> the<WG3588> twelve<WG1427> called<WG4341> the<WG3588> multitude<WG4128> of the<WG3588> disciples<WG3101> unto them, and said,<WG2036> It is<WG2076> not<WG3756> reason<WG701> that we<WG2248> should leave<WG2641> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> of God,<WG2316> and serve<WG1247> tables.<WG5132>

Wherefore, <WG3767> brethren,<WG80> look ye out<WG1980> among<WG1537> you<WG5216> seven<WG2033> men<WG435> of honest report,<WG3140> full<WG4134> of the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> and<WG2532> wisdom,<WG4678> whom<WG3739> we may appoint<WG2525> over<WG1909> this<WG5026> business.<WG5532>
But <WG1161> we<WG2249> will give ourselves continually<WG4342> to prayer,<WG4335> and<WG2532> to the<WG3588> ministry<WG1248> of the<WG3588> word.<WG3056>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> saying<WG3056> pleased<WG700> the<WG1799> whole<WG3956> multitude:<WG4128> and<WG2532> they chose<WG1586> Stephen,<WG4736> a man<WG435> full<WG4134> of faith<WG4102> and<WG2532> of the Holy<WG40> Ghost,<WG4151> and<WG2532> Philip,<WG5376> and<WG2532> Prochorus,<WG4402> and<WG2532> Nicanor,<WG3527> and<WG2532> Timon,<WG5096> and<WG2532> Parmenas,<WG3937> and<WG2532> Nicolas<WG3532> a proselyte<WG4339> of Antioch: <WG491>
Whom <WG3739> they set<WG2476> before<WG1799> the<WG3588> apostles:<WG652> and<WG2532> when they had prayed,<WG4336> they laid their hands on<WG2007> <WG5495> them.<WG846>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> increased;<WG837> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> number<WG706> of the<WG3588> disciples<WG3101> multiplied<WG4129> in<WG1722> Jerusalem<WG2419> greatly;<WG4970> and<WG5037> a great<WG4183> company<WG3793> of the<WG3588> priests<WG2409> were obedient<WG5219> to the<WG3588> faith.<WG4102>
And <WG1161> Stephen,<WG4736> full<WG4134> of faith<WG4102> and<WG2532> power,<WG1411> did<WG4160> great<WG3173> wonders<WG5059> and<WG2532> miracles<WG4592> among<WG1722> the<WG3588> people.<WG2992>

Then <WG1161> there arose<WG450> certain<WG5100> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> synagogue,<WG4864> which is called<WG3004> the synagogue of the Libertines,<WG3032> and<WG2532> Cyrenians,<WG2956> and<WG2532> Alexandrians,<WG221> and<WG2532> of them<WG3588> of<WG575> Cilicia<WG2791> and<WG2532> of Asia,<WG773> disputing with<WG4802> Stephen.<WG4736>
And <WG2532> they were not able<WG2480> <WG3756> to resist<WG436> the<WG3588> wisdom<WG4678> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> spirit<WG4151> by which<WG3739> he spake.<WG2980>

Then <WG5119> they suborned<WG5260> men,<WG435> which said,<WG3004> We have heard<WG191> him<WG846> speak<WG2980> blasphemous<WG989> words<WG4487> against<WG1519> Moses,<WG3475> and<WG2532> against God.<WG2316>

And <WG5037> they stirred up<WG4787> the<WG3588> people,<WG2992> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> elders,<WG4245> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> scribes,<WG1122> and<WG2532> came upon<WG2186> him, and caught<WG4884> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> brought<WG71> him to<WG1519> the<WG3588> council,<WG4892>

And <WG5037> set up<WG2476> false<WG5571> witnesses,<WG3144> which said,<WG3004> This<WG3778> man<WG444> ceaseth<WG3973> not<WG3756> to speak<WG2980> blasphemous<WG989> words<WG4487> against<WG2596> this<WG5127> holy<WG40> place,<WG5117> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> law: <WG3551>

For <WG1063> we have heard<WG191> him<WG846> say,<WG3004> that<WG3754> this<WG3778> Jesus<WG2424> of Nazareth<WG3480> shall destroy<WG2647> this<WG5126> place,<WG5117> and<WG2532> shall change<WG236> the<WG3588> customs<WG1485> which<WG3739> Moses<WG3475> delivered<WG3860> us.<WG2254>

And <WG2532> all<WG537> that sat<WG2516> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> council,<WG4892> looking steadfastly<WG816> on<WG1519> him,<WG846> saw<WG1492> his<WG846> face<WG4383> as it had been<WG5616> the face<WG4383> of an angel.<WG32>
